00010 GameManager::GameManager(AppManager* appManager)
00011 {
00012     using namespace scene;
00013 
00014     cout << "--- Initing game manager" << endl;
00015 
00016     manager.app = appManager;
00017 
00018     worldSettings = manager.app->globalSettings.world;
00019 
00020     running = true;
00021 
00022     manager.gameEngine = manager.app->GetGameEngine();

00024     manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(false);

00032     manager.scene->AddParallelScene(parallelscene.light);
00033 
00034     parallelscene.meshs = new scene::MeshParallelScene;
00035     manager.scene->AddParallelScene(parallelscene.meshs);
00036 
00037     parallelscene.newton = new scene::NewtonParallelScene;
00038     parallelscene.newton->SetGravity(worldSettings.gravity);
00039     NewtonSetSolverModel(parallelscene.newton->GetNewtonWorld(), 8);
00040     NewtonSetFrictionModel(parallelscene.newton->GetNewtonWorld(), 1);
00041     manager.scene->AddParallelScene(parallelscene.newton);
00042 
00043     parallelscene.particles = new scene::ParticlesParallelScene;
00044     manager.scene->AddParallelScene(parallelscene.particles);
00045 
00046     if(manager.app->globalSettings.noaudio)
00047         manager.fmodsys = NULL;
00048     else
00049         manager.fmodsys = appManager->GetFmodSystem();

00052     manager.sound = new SoundManager(this);

00059 GameManager::~GameManager()
00060 {
00061     cout << "--- Cleaning game manager" << endl;
00062 
00063     manager.gui->SetSession(MENU_QUICKPLAY);
00064 
00065     manager.gameEngine->SetGrabInput(false);
00066     manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(true);
00067 
00068     if(!manager.app->globalSettings.noaudio && !manager.app->globalSettings.nomusic)
00069         FMOD_Sound_Release(map.musicStream);
00070 
00071     delete manager.sound;
00072     delete manager.material;
00073     delete manager.level;
00074 
00075     manager.scene->ClearAll();
00076 }

00078 void GameManager::RegisterItem(Item* item)
00079 {
00080     manager.material->AddItem(item);
00081     map.items.push_back(item);
00082 }

00084 void GameManager::RegisterStatic(StaticObject* staticObject)
00085 {
00086     manager.material->AddStatic(staticObject);
00087     map.staticObjects.push_back(staticObject);
00088     map.aabb.Count(staticObject);
00089 }

00097 void GameManager::UnRegisterItem(Item* item)
00098 {
00099     Item::Array::iterator it = find(map.items.begin(),
00100                                     map.items.end(), item);
00101 
00102     map.items.erase(it);
00103 }
